sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: when all things in nature begin to sprout,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: when all things in nature begin to sprout,

sense.def: begin to shoot spouts, begin to grow and flourish

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: when all things in nature begin to sprout,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: when all things in nature begin to sprout,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: or when, in the months of late autumn,

sense.def: late (as in 季秋 late autumn)

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: or when, in the months of late autumn,

sense.def: distant in time CC 遙夜 "long nights"

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: or when, in the months of late autumn,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: the Master wanders about here and there,

sense.def: my elder master, our master, the master, our elder masters etc.

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: the Master wanders about here and there,

sense.def: walk back and forth in hesitation; occasionally: be plagued by hesitation

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: the Master wanders about here and there,

sense.def: flutter freely about in existence; roam about;

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: roaming against the wind

sense.def: go physically against (the direction of the wind etc)

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: roaming against the wind

sense.def: wander about; be on a pleasure trip; take a pleasure trip; roam freely

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He goes off along the bank of the Red River

sense.def: go to a contextually determinate place and V, set out to V; be on one's way to (with a verbal (or subjectless sentential, if one prefers) object) 往拜之

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He goes off along the bank of the Red River

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and comes back by climbing the slope of the Hidden Hill,

sense.def: to come in order to V; come so as to V; come for the purpose of Ving

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and comes back by climbing the slope of the Hidden Hill,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and comes back by climbing the slope of the Hidden Hill,

sense.def: non-rocky mountain smaller than fù 阜

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and comes back by climbing the slope of the Hidden Hill,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: gazing down the road to Quyuan,

sense.def: go close to, get close to; approach (and gaze down on)

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: gazing down the road to Quyuan,

sense.def: (traditionally: two-track) wide road suitable for carts; main thoroughfare

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: looking back towards the vast provinces p he has just visited].

sense.def: turn back on and look at

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: looking back towards the vast provinces p he has just visited].

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He stops in vague stupor

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He stops in vague stupor

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He stops in vague stupor

sense.def: desist from doing what one was going to do

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and rests in forgtfulness,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and rests in forgtfulness,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

sense.def: take a rest; rest at, put up at

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: not realizing why he had previously been moving

sense.def: have got to know thoroughly > realize, understand

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: not realizing why he had previously been moving

sense.def: walk, take a walk; travel; be on the move; go on a tour of inspection; walk along

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: or why he remains still now.

sense.def: OBI: present, contemporary; in the present sequence of days/months

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: or why he remains still now.

sense.def: stay in the contextually determinate place

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He sighs and feels royless,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He sighs and feels royless,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: sadly returning to the state of plain simplicity.

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: It is noon and he is idle,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: It is noon and he is idle,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: It is noon and he is idle,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I know neither his family name nor his polite appellation.

sense.def: know the identity of N; know of; recognize the identity of

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I know neither his family name nor his polite appellation.

sense.def: know, be sure of; know all about

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: And so he pays no attention to it

sense.def: disregard the contextually determinate N as irrelevant or unimportant

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: the creatures died of worry;

tls:text.tls:line: or "make your pace in walking conform to a musical beat"

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Formerly the living fought for existence

sense.def: in the past; HF 1.3.1: formerly, not too long ago, in the not too distant past

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Formerly the living fought for existence

sense.def: the whole flock, all the various

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I will transform and change

sense.def: change and be transformed, undergo all sorts of changes and transformations

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I will transform and change

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: nor see his true condition;

sense.def: realise, be able to understand what is not immediately visible; see through, recognise the true nature of

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: nor see his true condition;

sense.def: genuine nature, essential nature, essence; esential tendencies

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: But they did not understand his essence,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: they only guessed at his dao,

sense.def: guess on the basis of hearsay

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: falsely giving it a vain name.

sense.def: falsely, without solid foundation in truth

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: falsely giving it a vain name.

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: falsely giving it a vain name.

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: those who were of an impetuous liberal nature esteemed him.

sense.def: regard highly; give high priority to; esteem;

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: those in the world who took pleasure in curiosities thought him exceptional.

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: When the Master had answered,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: When the Master had answered,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: When the Master had answered,

sense.def: colloquial: this 若由也; this matter 若所為
(treat, raise) as animal; (live) like a beast

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I will live like a bird die like a beast.

sense.def: be alive; remain alive; cf. also shēng qín 生擒 "catch while he is still alive"

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I will live like a bird die like a beast.

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: burying my body here,

sense.def: bury by simply digging (someone) into the ground; dig (objects) into the ground

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: burying my body here,

sense.def: the body of the contextually determinate N

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: burying my body here,

sense.def: set aside, leave aside, leave out

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: burying my body here,

sense.def: the bones of a contextually determinate person

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: leaving behind my bones.

sense.def: again (as in 復戰 "fight again, renew battle".(often of reverting to an original state:) again (失而復得"lose but regain again") occasionally and rarely adversative: on the contrary; (with negatives, not) any more, not any longer; but again

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: leaving behind my bones.

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: leaving behind my bones.

sense.def: one's high intent; one's aspirations; one's moral aspiration, one's highest ambition; one's main tendencyBUDDH: religious aspirations
seek the company or friendship of

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: men who like to be together adjust their characters to one another.

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: men who like to be together adjust their characters to one another.

sense.def: try to be well-aligned, aim to be well-attuned

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I would like to throw my lot in with yours!"

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I would like to throw my lot in with yours!"

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I would like to throw my lot in with yours!"

sense.def: collaborate on N1 with N2 與夫子同之 “collaborate with you, my master, on things"

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I would like to throw my lot in with yours!"

sense.def: cognate object; indefinite dummy object pronouns without reference: things, people; someone 以約失之者"Those who, through keeping to the main thing, get things wrong"

seg.line: 于是先生乃舒虹霓以蕃塵，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 于是先生乃舒虹霓以蕃塵，
于是先生乃舒虹霓以蕃塵，

sense.def: my elder master, our master, the master, our elder masters etc.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 于是先生乃舒虹霓以蕃塵，

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Therupon the Master unfurled a rainbow to protect himself from the dust

tls:text.tls:srcline: 于是先生乃舒虹霓以蕃塵，

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Therupon the Master unfurled a rainbow to protect himself from the dust

sense.def: dust; sand; (also abstractly in a transferred sense: defilement)
cause to be slanted, cause to be lowered on one side
baldachin of a carriage; chariot canopy; umbrella
cover (the body with clothes etc); screen (the sun)

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He leaned on the jewelled luggage rack of his carriage and drove to and fro,

sense.def: lean (often, but not always, heavily) on; HF: lean against (a gate)

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He leaned on the jewelled luggage rack of his carriage and drove to and fro,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He leaned on the jewelled luggage rack of his carriage and drove to and fro,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He leaned on the jewelled luggage rack of his carriage and drove to and fro,

sense.def: walk back and forth in hesitation; occasionally: be plagued by hesitation
the numerous (primarily of persons), the numerous (dignified objects); the many; all the various
at one's ease; slowly; at a leisurely pace SHI

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: And then he turned and said to the hermit:

sense.def: turn one's head to look, look in a new direction

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The True Man of the Great Beginning

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The True Man of the Great Beginning

sense.def: the True Man, the man true to himself

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: is the very Root of Heaven!

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: When he concentrates his breath and unifies his will

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: When he concentrates his breath and unifies his will

sense.def: (cause to become a unit >) to unite (e.g. the empire); unify (people's outlooks), cause to (continue to be) unified

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: When he concentrates his breath and unifies his will

sense.def: one's high intent; one's aspirations; one's moral aspiration, one's highest ambition; one's main tendencyBUDDH: religious aspirations
subsist, persist, continue to exist, remain; survive

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: It is thus that his [literally, my] body is achieved.

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: It is thus that his [literally, my] body is achieved.

sense.def: cause (oneself) to be complete> make (oneself) accomplished

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: while his gate opens in the southeast [i.e. he is omnipresent?].

sense.def: open (so that it will be permanently unlocked or visible) YILI: 啟會"open the lid"

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: For him the dao is subtle and, it its virtue he can amuse himself for long [?].

sense.def: consider as and treat as subtle and profound

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: For him the dao is subtle and, it its virtue he can amuse himself for long [?].

sense.def: for a long time; permanently; in the long run (often postposed); after a long time; in the long term

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: For him the dao is subtle and, it its virtue he can amuse himself for long [?].

sense.def: take one's pleasure; indulge in the profound joys

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He spans the universe and dwells in the place of honor.

sense.def: jump onto so as to ride

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He spans the universe and dwells in the place of honor.

sense.def: take one's seat in (a seat of honour etc.)

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He spans the universe and dwells in the place of honor.

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He dwells without avoiding other beings

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He dwells without avoiding other beings

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: When he retires, you do not see his back;

sense.def: the rear, that which is behind one; the rearguard; the hind part

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: when he advances, you do not observe his face.

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: His constructions [?] begin in the northwest,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and thus end my days here.

tls:text.tls:line: and thus end my days here.

tls:text.tls:line: I will raise up my ambitions to be brilliant and superior,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I will raise up my ambitions to be brilliant and superior,

sense.def: one's high intent; one's aspirations; one's moral aspiration, one's highest ambition; one's main tendencyBUDDH: religious aspirations

sense.def: cause to be orderly; keep in good order

tls:text.tls:line: Then they peered into their mirrors to put their ornaments straight

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and, gnashing their teeth and leading one another on, they followed off , one ofter the other,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and, gnashing their teeth and leading one another on, they followed off , one ofter the other,

sense.def: (normally human or equine etc) front teeth, tooth

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and, gnashing their teeth and leading one another on, they followed off , one ofter the other,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: according to their age,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: according to their age,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: walking in strict ranks,

sense.def: ensue; follow behind (rather than go in front); trail behind and follow

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: walking in strict ranks,

sense.def: jointly, en groupe; together with all others

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: walking in strict ranks,

sense.def: move forward, step forward, come forward

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: staring with their eyes fixed on high.

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: staring with their eyes fixed on high.

sense.def: to pace (slowly); to walk along at measured speed; trot along;

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: staring with their eyes fixed on high.

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: staring with their eyes fixed on high.

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Tramping in the footsteps left by the one who went before they trod up the stairs [leading to his reception hall],

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Tramping in the footsteps left by the one who went before they trod up the stairs [leading to his reception hall],

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Tramping in the footsteps left by the one who went before they trod up the stairs [leading to his reception hall],

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Tramping in the footsteps left by the one who went before they trod up the stairs [leading to his reception hall],

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: hurrying their pace, in best ritual fashion, hands on breast, elbows outspread, and slightly leaning forward.

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: hurrying their pace, in best ritual fashion, hands on breast, elbows outspread, and slightly leaning forward.

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: hurrying their pace, in best ritual fashion, hands on breast, elbows outspread, and slightly leaning forward.

sense.def: reach as far as the contextually determinate object

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: They sat down shoulder to shoulder,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: made a respectful bow with their sleeves,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: made a respectful bow with their sleeves,

sense.def: shake one's sleeve (as a polite gesture)

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: But they hesitated to approach,

sense.def: one of the rare bisyllabic morphemes: hesitate

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: none daring to take the first place.

sense.def: to be willing (to do something one is asked or expected to do but which one has the possibility to refuse to do), be prepared to, agree to V

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Then one man among them,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: who was their brave hero,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: who was their brave hero,

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: with angry eye and all his muscles tensed,spoke out in a loud voice:

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: with angry eye and all his muscles tensed,spoke out in a loud voice:

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: with angry eye and all his muscles tensed,spoke out in a loud voice:

sense.def: with loud words, with a loud voice

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I was born after the time of Tang and Yu

sense.def: be born in N; get reborn in N

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I was born after the time of Tang and Yu

sense.def: be born at the time N

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and gew up in the generations succeeding Wen and Wu.

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and gew up in the generations succeeding Wen and Wu.

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I amused myself during the heyday of Kings Cheng and Kang

sense.def: enjoy oneself, spend one's free time

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I amused myself during the heyday of Kings Cheng and Kang

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and am at the height of my powers under our present sovereigns.

sense.def: be in a flourishing state, be in full vigour

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and am at the height of my powers under our present sovereigns.

sense.def: of the present time 今者之世

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I am learned in the doctrine of the Six Books of the Canon

sense.def: intone formally (poetry, not necessarily by heart: HANSHU 62 p. 2714-5); recite emphatically (distinguished prose); preach

tls:text.tls:line: I am learned in the doctrine of the Six Books of the Canon

sense.def: the six classics 《诗》《书》《礼》《易》《乐》《春秋》

sense.def: teaching, message conveyed through instruction; instructions; doctrine

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I am learned in the doctrine of the Six Books of the Canon

sense.def: intone formally (poetry, not necessarily by heart: HANSHU 62 p. 2714-5); recite emphatically (distinguished prose); preach

tls:text.tls:line: and practiced in the relics of our scholarly lore.

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I have, for a very long time, dressed in silken robes,

sense.def: read pī: wear (cloth); bear (shield etc); abstractly, occasionally: bear (a bad name etc)

tls:line.title: Translation of 阮籍集四卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I have, for a very long time, dressed in silken robes,

tls:text.tls:line: worn flying feathers on my cap,

sense.def: wear a hat; be of the age beyond 20 where one wears hats

tls:text.tls:line: worn flying feathers on my cap,
